customProperties.armorEffects: Can only be made into Armor. Any shield you hold is considered Druid Useable.
customProperties.weaponEffects: While this weapon is being wielded, any armor you wear is considered Druid Useable.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Magic Items made from Goldbark that require a Druid to attune to them do not have a Gold Cost.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Can only be made into Armor. Any shield you hold is considered Druid Useable.
Weapon Effects: While this weapon is being wielded, any armor you wear is considered Druid Useable.
Additional Effects: Magic Items made from Goldbark that require a Druid to attune to them do not have a Gold Cost.
